column2: Verify user is able to successfully create a new account with valid details
Verify login functionality with valid and invalid credentials
Verif homepage banners are visible and loaded without error
Verify navigation menu links redirect to the correct category pages(e.g., Sports, Men, Women)
Verify product search and filters work correctly for price, brand, and category
Verify product details page displays correct images, specifications, and reviews
Verify user can add items to the cart and complete the checkout process successfully
Verify contact us form accepts valid inputs and displays success/error messages
Verify footer links (About Us, Privacy Policy, etc.) navigate to correct pages
